=== Get Help ===
There are many ways to get help from other Power Users:
* Do you prefer it in real time? Join our <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net?channels=ubuntu-power-users|IRC channel]]</nowiki> and ask.
* Do you want the answer delivered right into your mailbox? Just subscribe to our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-power-users|mailing list]]</nowiki>.
* Do you want to get the best answer? Ask it on <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/|Ask Ubuntu]]</nowiki>!

Do not forget to take a quick look to <nowiki>[[PowerUsers-Documentation#FAQ|Frequently Asked Questions]]</nowiki> before to ask, maybe what you're looking for it's already there.
